```{r,message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(yingtools2)
library(phyloseq)
library(scales)
```



Sort `cid.patients` by `agebmt`
```{r}
cid.patients[order(cid.patients$agebmt),]
```
OR
```{r}
cid.patients %>% arrange(agebmt)
```




Tally race
```{r}
cid.patients %>% count(race)
```



Tally race and sort in descending
```{r}
cid.patients %>% count(race,sort=TRUE)
```


Tally race and sort in descending
```{r}
cid.patients %>% count(race,sort=TRUE)
```
